channel.title: Omfg help on connecting to other servers pls
channel.description:
Ive looked at tons of tuts and stuff but when i go onto the main screen where you logg in, i click file in the top left corner, then click the new ip option paste my desired ip and click ok, tells me that it must be down all the time and to make another server (the option next to logg in)
somone just simply explain to me, maybe a pic or something would help ty
